name: muddy-water
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.x-y: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.
